name: Shapes Purgatory
description:
Shapes Purgatory

Use the mouse to aim and shoot and use the keyboard to move.

One life, one room, many evil triangles.

Made solo in 9 hours for the GMTK  Jam 2019!

Hope you enjoy!

My youtube channel => https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCl9trNk_L-LC5FS259d7ayA

Music procedurally generated with this super cool tool  => https://github.com/HackerPoet/Composer
